泲泲泲

泲字的基本解释

泲
jǐ
过滤。
古地名，在今中国河南省浚县。
古同“济”，济水，古河名。

泲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jǐ］
［《集韻》子禮切，上薺，精。］
(1)过滤。
(2)同“挤”。用力使从孔隙中流出。
(3)同“濟”。古水名。古四渎之一。发源于河南省济源县王屋山，东流至山东省东北部入海。历代多次变迁，今已不可详考。
(4)同“濟”。古水名。发源于河北省赞皇山，东流至柏乡县东注入宁晋泊。

泲字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泲； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页619第01
【玉篇】古文濟字。【說文】泲，沇也。東流於海。○按沇水，卽濟水。發源爲沇，東流爲濟。　又地名。【詩·邶風】出宿于泲。　又莤泲，釃酒也。【周禮·天官·酒正註】泲，謂醴之淸者。

泲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
泲字的起名意思

暂无。

clear wine
Basic explanation of words
clear wine
jǐ
filter.
Ancient place names, in present-day Jun County, Henan Province, China.
Ancient Tong "ji", Jishui, the name of the ancient river.
clear wine
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jǐ］
["Jiyun" Ziliqie, upper water chestnut, fine. ]
(1) Filter.
(2) Same as "squeeze". Force it to flow out of the pores.
(3) The same "ji". Ancient water name. One of the ancient four dunes. It originated in Wangwu Mountain, Jiyuan County, Henan Province, and flows eastward to the northeastern part of Shandong Province into the sea. There have been many changes in the past, and it is no longer possible to examine them in detail.
(4) The same "ji". Ancient water name. Originated from Zanhuang Mountain in Hebei Province, it flows eastward to Baixiang County and flows eastward into Ningjinbo.
clear wine
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　泲; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 619 01
【Jade articles】Ancient Chinese characters. [Said Wen] Ye, Ye Ye. Flowing eastward in the sea. ○Press 沇水 to save water. The origin is 沇, the east flow is for the benefit.　Also place name. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】Students in Chao.　It’s awkward, and the wine is too. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Liquor Note】Chui, which is called the 醴之淸.
clear wine
